public class CurlCacheToken

    A a cache manager for token used by the CurlProcessor

    • Method Detail

      • getTokenCache

        public <X extends java.lang.RuntimeException> java.lang.String getTokenCache(@NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.String key,
                                                                             java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> function,
                                                                             int retries,
                                                                             java.util.function.Supplier<? extends X> exceptionSupplier)
        Return a cache token.
        Parameters:
        key - The cache key.
        function - The Function used to retrieve the token value when the cache fails.
        retries - The amount of retries until the provider returns a not null value.
        exceptionSupplier - The exception used when the token cannot be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The token value either from the cache, either from the fresh computed one.

      • getTokenCache

        public <X extends java.lang.RuntimeException> java.lang.String getTokenCache(@NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.Object synchronizeObject,
                                                                             @NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.String key,
                                                                             java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> function,
                                                                             int retries,
                                                                             java.util.function.Supplier<? extends X> exceptionSupplier)
        Return a synchronized cache token.
        Parameters:
        synchronizeObject - The object used to synchronize the access to the cache.
        key - The cache key.
        function - The Function used to retrieve the token value when the cache fails.
        retries - The amount of retries until the provider returns a not null value.
        exceptionSupplier - The exception used when the token cannot be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The token value either from the cache, either from the fresh computed one.
